thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 15 of 539
thread.title: Stephanie

author: Stephanie
title: Stephanie
text: There is a very wide variety of dresses which my friends and I love but the variety of sizes I've noticed isn't the best. I wasn't looking to spend a lot on my prom dress this year so I kept it under 200 but most of those dresses only came in small medium and large which makes it hard. I'd love to see at least x small and x large but also short regular or long lengths. It will help the costumers be more satisfied and the business as more people will be willing to buy a dress. Also love the return policy! Makes it less stressful to be able to order a couple dresses and return the ones I'm not satisfied with!
